test_questions.explanation: The code won't compile since declaration of t cannot occur within parenthesis.

test_questions.question: In which stage the following code #include<stdio.h>  gets replaced by the contents of the file stdio.h
test_questions.explanation: The preprocessor replaces the line #include <stdio.h> with the system header file of that name. More precisely, the entire text of the file 'stdio.h' replaces the #include directive.
